objects.text:
• Premium crystal pavé heart embellishments
• Rose gold-toned finish for timeless elegance
• Adjustable open-ended design for perfect fit

product_details.name: Elegant Crystal Heart Cuff Bracelet - Sparkling Romance Collection
product_details.description:
• Delicate open-ended cuff design for adjustable fit
• Premium quality crystal pavé heart embellishments
• Rose gold-toned finish for timeless elegance
• Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear
• Perfect for special occasions and romantic gestures
• Dual crystal heart accents at both ends
• Hypoallergenic material suitable for sensitive skin
• Sophisticated minimalist style with glamorous details
• Makes an ideal gift for anniversaries, birthdays, or Valentine's Day
• Modern contemporary design suitable for all age groups

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, romantic theme, perfect for promoting elegant accessories or jewelry. The background uses a delicate radial gradient blended with soft pink overlays and curving lines, decorated with subtle dots and triangle patterns to convey a dreamy ambiance. The layout is clean and balanced, with the product image ("product_image") floating towards the right, drawing attention. The headline text ("heading") is bold and centrally placed on the left, followed by a brief product description ("description"). Above it, a refined tagline ("tagline") adds a romantic touch. The pricing ("price") is shown in a prominent, stylish font, with a contrasting call-to-action ("cta", "cta_background") in a rose-mauve colored button.

**Color Palette**:
- Pastel Pink (#FFE0E6)
- Light Cream (#FFF5F7)
- Rose Mauve (#C06377)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- Medium Gray (#555555)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a delicate, elegant bracelet adorned with crystal-studded heart ends. The primary color palette includes soft metallic silver (#C0C0C0), shimmering crystal white (#F8F8FF), and subtle rose gold highlights (#EBCBB6). The silver base gives the bracelet a sleek, modern appeal, while the crystals add sparkle and glamour. These tones blend smoothly, yet are accentuated by reflective lighting, which highlights the texture and brilliance of the crystal elements. The colors are used to balance luxury and softness, making a refined yet eye-catching composition—ideal for an advertisement banner targeting minimalistic elegance with romantic and premium appeal.
